urls.title: Cebu Pacific - CEB Super Pass
urls.description: We heard you, everyJuan! The CEB Super Pass is back, until October 13, 2022 only! Buy as many one-way vouchers as you can and fly to any Philippines destination, anytime! Terms and conditions apply. We've reached the maximum number of passes sold. This was a great run! Super thank you! CEB Super Pass selling period has ended. Check out our Seat Sale page for more offers! Redeem your voucher and book a flight to any Philippine destination! Redemption Period: October 10, 2022 to November 23, 2023 Travel

data.text: @daniellenacpil Hi Dani 👑. Flights on which you may use your CEB Super Pass is subject to availability during redemption. You may check for the actual availability at flight search and choose from the flights listed in https://t.co/C67eV6etC9 .

data.text: @geeneticengr Hi there! Company ID maybe accepted at check-in as long as it's valid with photo, date of birth and signature. Remember, all documents/ IDs presented are subject to airports discretion and profiling. For complete travel guidelines, ..
@smhbalt HI Nisha. Official Receipt is send to the email address provided once booking is confirmed. Please check the email address used. Thank you.

@jxnnyvv than the aforementioned carry-on dimensions, you may bring it onboard but you need to purchase another seat/ another ticket. Otherwise, you will need to check-in the item and must be places in a hard case. For more information, visit https://t.co/rfiF2XaINK. Hope this helps!

@jxnnyvv Hi there! Acoustic Guitar is allowed for Hand carry with a cloth cover. Please be advised that electric/acoustic guitar placed in a hard case cover is for check-in. If size of the guitar is bigger
@camsasuncion Hi camsasuncion. Original PSA Birth Certificate will be accepted for domestic travel. Thank you.

urls.title: Cebu Pacific - CEB Super Pass
urls.description: We heard you, everyJuan! The CEB Super Pass is back, until October 13, 2022 only! Buy as many one-way vouchers as you can and fly to any Philippines destination, anytime! Terms and conditions apply. We've reached the maximum number of passes sold. This was a great run! Super thank you! CEB Super Pass selling period has ended. Check out our Seat Sale page for more offers! Redeem your voucher and book a flight to any Philippine destination! Redemption Period: October 10, 2022 to November 23, 2023 Travel

data.text: @Bbartsep In case CEB Super Pass is unavailable on your intended date of departure, you may opt to avail of CEB’s year-round low fares instead and use your CEB Super Pass for other upcoming trips. For more info, kindly check this link: https://t.co/C67eV6w4tH. Thank you.

@Bbartsep HI Bbartsep. Flights on which you may use your CEB Super Pass is subject to availability during redemption. You may check for the actual availability at flight search and choose from the flights marked with “CEB Super Pass”.

@rycevicencio We sincerely apologize for this inconvenience ᴿʸᶜᴱ. At any time after a booking has been made, we may change our schedules and/or cancel any flight where we reasonably consider this to be justified by circumstances beyond our control or for reasons of safety and security.
@BajadoChonel Hi chonel! You may check and search for the lowest fare for your preferred flight and schedule thru our website at https://t.co/kPgrcWAGam . Hope to see you on board soon!

@yoitsark Hi, Maybe: Arkie! Travel requirements may vary depending on passenger's category and purpose of travel. You may visit https://t.co/5glTT4Zede for more information or coordinate with the Japan Government for more specific and up-to-date requirements and guidelines. Thank you!

@FactsLang29 Hi Darlene! Bern here. You're welcome to bring your wheelchair on the flight, whether it's non-electronic or electronic/battery-operated. If your wheelchair is battery-operated, don't forget to take out the battery before boarding so we can check it in.

@jG4LISA Hi jG4LISA. Bern here. Spare/loose batteries like Power banks, must be carried in hand-carry baggage only & must NOT exceed 100Wh (equivalent to about 20,000mAh to 27,000mAh depending on the output voltage). And must be individually protected to avoid short-circuit. See you!

data.text: @Noulsnoulss I'm sorry to hear this Nols. Please do the following troubleshooting and try again. -Clear your browser's cache and cookies -Use another device (e.g. laptop, desktop computer, etc.) -Try to use Google Chrome browser if possible. For mobile app, ensure that the version is updated.

@jakestatic I'm sorry to hear about this experience jakey . Flight schedules may be changed due to several reasons. CEB will send an SMS & email notification to affected passengers, using contact details they have provided in their booking. View your options here https://t.co/k9grG8YJsw.

@jakestatic Thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt. To assist you, kindly message us thru https://t.co/GI0vBwkpOi and start chatting with our live agents. We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@jakestatic Thanks for reaching us, jakey. To monitor/check the status of your flight, you may refer to https://t.co/n8RpsOcAwS. Or for any travel advisory, kindly visit https://t.co/KuymGz608i. Thank you!

@joannamaried Thank you for raising the concern and we are sorry to hear the inconvenience you may have felt, Joanna. To check on this further, kindly send an email thru our Guest Feedback Form via this link: (https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc). We'll wait for you there, Thank you.
